titles.title: ACT for Schools Act
Affordable Housing Expansion and Public Safety Act
A bill to direct the Attorney General to conduct a study on the feasibility of collecting crime data relating to the occurrence of school-related crime in elementary schools and secondary schools.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 11/16/2006--Introduced. Accurate Crime Trends for Schools Act or the ACT for Schools Act - Directs the Attorney General to study and report to the appropriate congressional committees on the feasibility of expanding the National Incident-Based Reporting System to include information on the occurrence of school-related crime in elementary and secondary schools. Requires the study to identify and evaluate methods for collecting and reporting such information.
